title: TaleSpins
description: A trilogy of alternative fairytales and retellings. Discover the real Snow White story through the eyes of Creepy, the unknown 8th dwarf! Meet a teen princess who hires "The Frog Prince" witch to get revenge on a Mean Girl at school! And learn how the giant, boy thief and magic beans tale truly went down! Check out the reviews for the first of the 3 stories (no longer available individually) here: https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/9...
author: Michael Mullin
